label: Graduate Level Organ
description: Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule. May be repeated to a maximum of 20 hours. Prerequisite: Selected studies from the masterworks of organ literature. Prerequisite: Graduate standing in music, or successful completion of a qualifying audition for appropriate faculty members of the Organ/Harpsichord Division.
courseSectionInformation: Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule. May be repeated to a maximum of 20 hours. Prerequisite: Selected studies from the masterworks of organ literature. Prerequisite: Graduate standing in music, or successful completion of a qualifying audition for appropriate faculty members of the Organ/Harpsichord Division.
classScheduleInformation: Non-music majors will be assessed a fee.
sectionDeptRestriction: Restricted to students in the Music department.
